website_summaries.verdict: Roomy, colorful, and mid-priced, but it also has some durability issues that may reduce its longevity.
pros: Offers a unique, expandable main compartment capable of fitting numerous items
cons: PVC material has the tendency to crack after several weeks of normal wear

customer_reviews.title: STRONG SPACIOUS & STURDY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAG so much I got another one. Originally purchased to use at the gym, I loved it so much a ditched my handbag and got another one for every day use. The plastic is thick. It's sturdy, strong, spacious and has a nice sized pocket in the front. I'm a pretty hardcore person with my things so I break things a lot. I was sure at some point I'd somehow rip the straps off, but this bag is very well made. if you're looking for a nice sized clear back pack you've found the one.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than expected but it fits so much! Very nostalgic and 90s.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Thread came out
customer_reviews.text: Had product for a month and the zipper threaded on lunch break then came open. Not worth the price. Not happy now I have to use more money for a new one. At the least 6 months of use would have been ok, but a month? Note the threads in the photos. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Great work bag!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is a good work bag. It’s pretty big, which is nice because I carry a lot of stuff around with me. The biggest negative I have so far with this bag is purely a personal preference. I don’t like that the zippers go all the way down to the bottom of the bag. Obviously that’s not that big of a deal and I would reorder this bag without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Leah1204

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far..
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bag a little over a week now and good so far. I work in the prison system so it provides the clear aspect and has plenty of room to take items with you i.e. Large food containers, office supplies, extra equipment. Only reason I'm giving 4 stars is I haven't had the bag long enough to see want kind of damage it can take and Weather or not it holds up to daily use and doesn't crack and bust like the other brand I had.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: This one is the Biggest and Largest Size Yet.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 kids in Middle School and they all needed clear backpacks. Because there are not may reviews on them yet, I did not know which ones to purchase. This made it vary difficult. So, I decided to order 3 different kinds and go from there. This one was by far the largest. Now I cannot say anything for how long it may last, but so far it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rayni Allen-Steinke

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Thick gauge plastic, very roomy, and separate pocket helps organizing. Straps are very sturdy, and the top loop is attached to the strap instead of the plastic to avoid tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Y.H. Binelli

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I must say I was very impressed by the quality of the bag. I had considered returning the bag because it was a little bigger than I needed but the seller did contact me and was easy to work with and after their contact I decided to keep the backpack. They were very considerate and concerned with my issue. This is really a nice big bag and I can definitely seeing multiple uses for this. It is definitely a durable product and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: cindy cho

customer_reviews.title: Roomy durable easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this backpack for school & though it’s only been a few days it’s proven to be durable-maybe even more so than fabric! She’s in 6th grade with a heavy load in her bag at times so I was worried the five would not be so good being plastic but there’s plenty of room for everything! She likes the mesh compartments in the side for her water bottle & the little pockets in the front for her smaller items. Couldn’t beat the price either. I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen g.

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold to one year of high schooler’s use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my high school freshman daughter who needed a clear backpack per new HS guidelines. She got this bag in the spring of her Freshman year, and by Christmas of her Sophomore year, not even a year later, it was cracked and the mesh was torm. It was being held together with duct tape. The bag lasted for 10 months before we had to replace it with a new one. It was only use 7 of those months. I really liked it, but not worth it, when I need to buy two per school year.
customer_reviews.author: Taznjo

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, reliable and actually strong for a clear bag.
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy! My daughter carries a lot of stuff to school, and this bag will open to hold more than she should actually carry. It's actually strong plastic and our school system actually bought one for every kid in the district. They have been wonderful for strength! Good shoulder straps and padding is sufficient for elementary and middle schoolers and even if you just needed to carry something to your job and needed a clear bag. I would have highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: g. barker

customer_reviews.title: Load it up, it can take it!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how strong the backpack is. It is able to collapse thin and flat, and when you fill it up it can hold 40+ pounds of items. I put in: a 3 inch binder, 2packs of filler paper, pocket dictionary, 6 spiral and 4 composition tablets, pack of 29 markers, pack of highlighters, 2 each 10 packs of pens and pencils, 3 hand sanitizers, combination lock, earbuds and other assorted smaller items. It all zipped in. The taller items stand straight up with enough top space to stuff in more if needed. The inner and side pockets are practical and strong. It also looks nice. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Rose of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Got my bag today came right when it said it would which is excellent. The bag is what they say the plastic is sturdy not that cheap stuff. 2 pockets on sides for your bottles or cups of tea front pocket can hold your id keys etc. The color is vibrant. What is best about this for me is there is no plastic smell... you know what I mean. I will update once I have gotten wear out of it. But for now I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jade-Starr

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 weeks only
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it was big enough for actual binders. Did not like that we'll need FOUR of these to make it through one school year (whereas ONE regular backpack has lasted us SIX YEARS of school). Just not quality. I've yet to find a clear backpack that CAN stand up to a school day... :/ Suggestions on another brand that works welcome!
customer_reviews.author: one mom in texas

customer_reviews.title: MADE PRINCESS TOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3rd grade Princess and its perfect. Its big amd very durable. She feels like she should carry her room everywhere she goes and this cute thing hauls the load. Even her big puffy pink coat fits in it with plenty of room remaining. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: DDK

customer_reviews.title: Good Clear Bag
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for the Women's March - ended up I didn't need a clear bag but I may in the future. Held a lot of stuff including a jacket and hooded sweatshirt and protest signs.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Invisible wonder!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! It's sturdy, see-through, and waterproof. It cuts wait time at parks when they have to look through your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Reaves

customer_reviews.title: durable and has a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: My son just entered middle school and they require a clear or mesh backpack. I was looking for something thick and durable because he has 7 classes worth of stuff to carry, and also I don't want to buy a new bag halfway through the school year. We are only 2 weeks in, but so far it's still just like new. He's toting around quite a bit of stuff too. The bag seems well made and it has a LOT of room in it. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine D. Cantor

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and LAST longer than others!
customer_reviews.text: My middle school daughter is required to wear clear see through backpacks this year and I have already bought her 2 since they tear/rip so easily. This one I purchased in October and had one of the moms text me asking where I got this new as it is holding up so nicely. This prompted me to write a review. I was pleasantly surprised with the size, color and durability of this backpack. It has exceeded my expectations especially for the price. I believe we will make it to the end of the year with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag..
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it but so far, great bag. I work at a prison so its great that I can take all my snacks and lunch to last me the whole night and not have to stuff the bag to where its going to bust at the seams. Seems like very durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Mandii

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy bag. Have to use a clear bag at work and this is a lot bigger than I was expecting. I can carry my lunch bag inside, a book, and drinks without coming close to filling the bag.
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I work in a pharmacy and needed a clear bag if I wanted to keep a bag behind the counter. Full size backpack, just don't put anything sharp inside. Left my keys in it for my shift and stretched the front pocket slightly. That being said, I wouldn't put too much weight in it, either.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports veunues
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked perfect for an all-day outdoor event where only clear bags were allowed. I was happy to see what good quality it was because I think it will hold up over the years. Also it holds a ton, we stuffed it full of things and there was still room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Addie15

customer_reviews.title: Good bag but did not survive my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Less than half a school year because my 6 year old drags the bag. But it is plastic. Otherwise it is a great bag, but really to big for a 35 pound 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ftmtam

customer_reviews.title: The material on the trim doesn't seem cheap like some other backpacks
customer_reviews.text: Thick plastic. Very durable. The material on the trim doesn't seem cheap like some other backpacks. Much bigger than I expected. Overall terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: Bratalie

customer_reviews.title: amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear bag for work & I decided on this one. I think I must pat myself on the back for this find. its held up fantastic in the couple months I've had it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Warner

customer_reviews.title: The bag looks very sturdy. Ive received compliments on the bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks very sturdy. Ive received compliments on the bag. My laptop with its case fits perfectly and I still have room to put my notebook and other stuff. So far so good. I am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made in years
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made in years! I go to a lot of festivals and concerts. These days they will only allow you to have clear backpacks. Purple is my favorite color, so this backpack made sense. I was able to hold all of my belongings like water bottles, medication, money, and tickets while comfortably carrying this backpack. The other cool part is it is way easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Missy D

customer_reviews.title: This bag will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Every bit as tough as advertised. Easily fit my laptop, tablet, all accessories, lunch, makeup bag, hair gel and spray, wallet, cigarettes, bartending gear, and hoodie. Had room to spare for 3 cans of diet coke! This is a tough, roomy backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Dana D Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Transparency for the win
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's spacious and perfect for holding my childs fun activities for a future plane ride. So far everything fits except the travel tray we have (pretty large) I think it will make a much easier time through airport security since you can see into it. Really like the color pink I chose. Overall it's perfect for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong well made bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag a couple weeks ago. I wanted to use it before posting a comment/ review. It's as strong & pretty as the 1st time I used it!
customer_reviews.author: tammy scrimgeour

customer_reviews.title: Security Easier
customer_reviews.text: With getting through security lines now this thing makes it a lot easier! We have used it in Disney World, Busch Gardens, and Washington DC. I have two kids so I have to have a backpack for their items. Makes life easier!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Moye

customer_reviews.title: See my medications & equipment at a glance
customer_reviews.text: So far huge I store my medications & test equipment in it. Easy to locate see what I have & very portable. Works for my needs. In RV travel everything stays in one place & nothing gets misplaced or lost.
customer_reviews.author: Engima

customer_reviews.title: Its exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This product was for work I have to carry items to get my job done and due to security concerns it has to be a clear bag of some sort. I picked this one because of the space and extra pockets I got the item in a timely manner and I really am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: r painter

customer_reviews.title: As expected.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The bag has lasted a while. I will reinforce with duck tape before it starts falling apart from being overloaded.
customer_reviews.author: Jannah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased with the product, but after a few weeks I noticed little cuts in the plastic; so I wouldn't recommend the product. Maybe the plastic is too hard
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It’s plastic....
customer_reviews.text: Backpack tore up in 3 weeks time. Definitely not military grade anything lol
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy T

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was bought for my son that is required to have a clear backpack for school. It was a replacement for the other backpack from the same company that I bought at beginning of the school year. I would recommend this backpack it's really sturdy & better quality than other backpacks we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Hooks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Seem very sturdy and my granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: lori schmidt

customer_reviews.title: She loves it ❤
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bookbag, and her favorite color is purple so I did good picking this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Lasted the whole school year
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this backpack and it lasted me the whole school year and lets just say my backpack wasn't very light but it still held up. The only thing I dislike are the straps they are not the most comfortable and eventually ripped a bit but never completely broke. For the price I totally recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: hope-you-dance

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great bag!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy! I have to use clear bags for work and this is very strong compared to the cheapies they provide us.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndie Champion

customer_reviews.title: Great size for older students
customer_reviews.text: We have had the backpacks (one in the light pink and one in the black) for about a week. They are being used by students in high school and the thing that we are impressed with most is the width of the bag. Because it is wider, it makes it much easier to get folders in and out of the clear/plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Large Sturdy Schoolbag
customer_reviews.text: Bag is very large. Good for Middle School, my granddaughter has a lot of books to carry and it holds everything well. She loved the color. Price was good. A+ It lasted the year. I just bought another one for this year.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marquart

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy backpack. However, the plastic is so thick in some places, like the top near the handle that it starts to crease and eventually crack and rip. My job requires carrying a clear backpack to enter security so I have to stuff my pack with everything I need for the day. This pack only lasted a few months before I had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn T. Zoota

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack is has a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Princesita

customer_reviews.title: It's, clear, it holds stuff, and lasts ...
customer_reviews.text: It's, clear, it holds stuff, and lasts as long as a mesh or canvas bags. Bonus is my kid hasn't been suspended for violation of school rules 😀
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes but like all the others it ripped from text books. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jones

customer_reviews.title: Is NOT heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This bag has only lasted 4 months before it has ripped open at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Windy Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Book bag seemed to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Book bag seemed to be of good quality...but bag ripped along zipper after one month. With a clear conscience I rate the BAGAIL book bag a one. I’m going to try and return but I don’t have a box.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and spacious. My middle schooler carries books, binders and PE clothes in it and it's still holding up after a few months. The plastic is very thick and the shoulder straps are sewn on well. I've tried a couple others, and this is the best so far in regard to quality and space.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack! Good for school
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and she loved it! good sturdy construction should last the whole year. Great color and good amount of compartments.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cort

customer_reviews.title: Best clear bag I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome!!! Roomy and the color is great. Love that the straps are secured with a band across the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: steffanie white

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trips
customer_reviews.text: I can see what is in the backpack. If going into stadium, it is easy to check out what is in my back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. My son can fit all his school books in the main pouch, and still has plenty of room for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: David Newlon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic leads to cheap bags
customer_reviews.text: Like most clear backpacks, this one wore out quit and the plastic tore. Par for the course. Heavy Duty it is not.
customer_reviews.author: slunky

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year later and it is still holding up great! I fill it up too! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ari P. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: All previous reviews were positive.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it higher but I haven't actually packed the bag with my "stuff" yet. Needed a clear bag I could use in a cleanroom, semiconductor manufacturing plant, environment. Every review done previously on this bag (32 when I purchased) was positive.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my hubby wear every day and love it it is form christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Renate Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: They stole my credit card information and added additional charges. Which I had to close my account. Worst Ever
customer_reviews.author: Debbie bricette

customer_reviews.title: Meets work expectations
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just been using for a few days at work. Love the color. I ordered 2 blue ones for 2 ladies I work with. A little stiff but doing the job
customer_reviews.author: JanWellse

customer_reviews.title: Good expansion, fits more books than previous purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it expands more than my previous one. Have not used it yet for my daughter as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: High hopes
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the bag ripped fairly quickly right at the strap. The plastic is hard but the strap didn’t hold very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirpat99

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear bag for my work. I bought 2. These backpacks are strong and sturdy. Very spacious. I use them to put my cleaning Supplies. This is my 3rd one I have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Very practical for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Good! I am not a student, son I use for traveling for my baby stuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my work and the others employees ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my work and the others employees to ask me where did you buy it..and I anwser them in Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: ester

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for him and has held up so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who works at a prison. It's perfect for him and has held up so far
customer_reviews.author: Twiggy

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids have tried a can not destroy them keeps all there book dry from the rain and other weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is an actual book bag, and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for work and it is great! It's cute and very durable. I don't put a lot in it but I certainly could if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Eckerman

customer_reviews.title: Great for work! Holds a bunch, keeps its shape well!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's a transparent bag with colorful trim and zippers! I ordered the purple, and I love it! I have to have a see through bag for work, and this is so much better than a tote!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Not made to carry books.
customer_reviews.text: The straps are not strong enough and not reinforced where stitched into the backpack. Loaded with notebooks and binders it needs to be strong. Lasted less than 1 month and started to come apart. Great looking bag otherwise but not made for school use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very study and well made. Child has not started using it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect bag. Durable
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect bag. Durable, big, and roomy. Actually i would have preferred it a little bit smaller since this bag was needed because I am a nurse in a jail but besides that it's a good back bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Came in time for a festival I'll be going to. Looks fine and is beautiful in person.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This one fell apart after only a few months. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kraynack

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent I got it for a friend, they love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have got this one at the beginning of the school year! Doubt I would have had to replace it! It was our third one for the year!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and seems to hold so much. This seems to be pretty sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was better than I expected. It's big and very sturdy. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jodi todd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. I bought it for my 6th grader lots of space. Quality is great. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect backpack for work! I needed one that was clear and sturdy. This worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: ... too small for Middle School but the quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: a bit too small for Middle School but the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: C.A

customer_reviews.title: Very durable plastic
customer_reviews.text: Like the see through bag. It is required to use in high school for kids. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only giving four stars because it’s still early in the school year. Seems to be holding up so far and my daughter loves the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Like this product! Work in the Correctional Facility and this works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: LeslieO

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Big backpack but very weak didn't Last one month. Zipper broke and a whole at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Good price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Good price! Definitely better than I thought it would be. Definitely going to be buying from seller again
customer_reviews.author: William gartrell

customer_reviews.title: Seams are reinforced
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and holds a lot of food As well as drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a substantial backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is substantial considering it’s a clear backpack. My daughter has been using it for two weeks now for school. Holding up very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Matches all my pink items if necessity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for work. I've gotten nothing but compliments. Very sturdy. Matches all my pink items if necessity. Thanks Bagail and Amazon. "Think Pink"!
customer_reviews.author: Tee~Tee

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space & I love the storage pocket
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I have everyone at the prison I work at asking me where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness and extra reinforcement by straps
customer_reviews.text: Strong plastic, thicker, have to use it for work. Reinforce stitching on straps is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cerase

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Lots of room, very durable. I am always stuffing it, zippers and straps can take it.. I've been using it for a few months, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: NurseBaez

customer_reviews.title: It’s a strong and well done backpack indeed...!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my granddaughter because Texas school bags regulations and I didn’t expect it so well fabricated and beautiful that my girl loves it a lot...!
customer_reviews.author: Aredwand

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my cousin months ago for school. It still looks new!
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Behavin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product came fast like it said it would and the description is proper. School doesn't start for a few months so I can't give a durability rating but everything else in the description is good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It's great.
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I work in a prison so we have to have clear back packs!
customer_reviews.author: Shared Account - Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was amazing! super sturdy! perfect for what I need it for

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The bag is just what we wanted Good size n quality
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Size was large enough for me. Price should have been cheaper. Great color.

product_meta.title: BAGAIL Clear Backpack Heavy Duty See Through Transparent Daypack Student School Bookbag
feature_bullets: Freeze-Proof and Certified Lead-Free PVC.Strong,Dependable,Tough Polyester Straps
Comfy Padded Adjustable Reinforced Shoulder Straps.
Extra Pockets for Organizing Supplies and Necessities.
This Item is Not Intended for Use by Children 12 and Under.
